description: Current message offset on broker.
Lag in messages between consumer and broker.
Current message offset on consumer.
Lag in seconds between consumer and broker. This metric is provided through Data Streams Monitoring. Additional charges may apply.
Total number of brokers in the cluster.
Number of partitions for which this broker is the leader.
Total number of partitions on this broker including replicas.
ID of the broker acting as the cluster controller.
Broker configuration for log retention in bytes.
Broker configuration for log retention in milliseconds.
Broker configuration for log segment size in bytes.
Broker configuration for default number of partitions.
Broker configuration for number of network threads.
Broker configuration for number of I/O threads.
Broker configuration for default replication factor.
Broker configuration for minimum in-sync replicas.
Total number of topics in the cluster.
Number of partitions for this topic.
Total number of messages in the topic.
Message production rate for this topic.
Topic configuration for retention time in milliseconds.
Topic configuration for retention size in bytes.
Topic configuration for maximum message size in bytes.
The earliest offset in the partition.
The latest offset in the partition (high watermark).
Number of messages in the partition.
Number of replicas for this partition.
Number of in-sync replicas for this partition.
Whether this partition is under-replicated (1) or not (0).
Whether this partition is offline (1) or not (0).
Total number of consumer groups.
Number of members in the consumer group.
Number of partitions assigned to this consumer group member.
Consumer group state indicator (always 1 with state as tag).
Total number of schema subjects in the registry.
Number of versions for this schema subject.
